miic.core.corr_mat_processing.corr_mat_import_US_stream¶

corr_mat_import_US_stream(st, pretrigger=0)[source]¶

Convert a stream with multiple traces from an active measurement in a correlation matrix structure.

This functions takes a stream with multiple traces and puts them in a correlation_matrix_structure to facilitate monitoring. It is assumed that: - traces are recorded by the same sensor - signals are emitted from the same source - stats[‘starttime’] is the time of the measurement - the source time starts pretrigger seconds before starttime - traces have the same length. Metainformation are taken from st[0] only.

Parameters:
  • st (Stream) – data stream
  • pretrigger (float) – time of source excitation in seconds after st[0].stats[‘starttime’]
Return type:

correlation matrix dictionary
Returns:

corr_mat: is the same dictionary as the input but with normalized ampitudes.
